author: mwrock
body: Continuation of PR #1802 . Moving to new PR since the original fork was no longer valid after the repo went public.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@mwrock**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! You've already signed the contribution license agreement. Thanks!

The agreement was validated by Microsoft and real humans are currently evaluating your PR.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: LGTM. Thanks for making the change. I'll merge it once CI passes.

title: clarify that visual studio with c++ compiler is required
